page.title: 13COTSWOLD EDGE GOLF CLUB
page.content: The Cotswold Edge Golf Club was opened in 1981 by Sir Anthony Kershaw. The land before was used as farm land. People come from Berkley and Wotton- Under- Edge and many other places to use this Golf Club.It costs one hundred and two pounds to join and then one hundred and twenty-five pounds for every years membership. The Golf Club owns a hundred acres of land.A lot of famous people have been there, including Henry Cooper (Boxer) and Terry Cooper (Manager of Bristol City Football Club.) The size of membership is about four hundred and thirty.There are thirty six trophies that are awarded for various competitions.
